License and sourcing problem tags.description: source info consists of bare image URL/generic base URL only
non-low-resolution fair use image (or too-long audio clip, etc)
fair use media with old revisions that need to be deleted

Wikimedia Commons-related tags.description: free media that should be copied to Commons

Wikimedia Commons-related tags.tag: {{Do not move to Commons}}: file not suitable for moving to Commons

subgroup.name: DoNotMoveToCommons_reason
subgroup.tooltip: Enter the reason why this image should not be moved to Commons (required). If the file is PD in the US but not in country of origin, enter 'US only'

subgroup.name: DoNotMoveToCommons_expiry
subgroup.tooltip: If this file can be moved to Commons beginning in a certain year, you can enter it here (optional).

Wikimedia Commons-related tags.tag: {{Keep local}}: request to keep local copy of a Commons file

subgroup.name: keeplocalName
subgroup.tooltip: Name of the image on Commons (if different from local name), excluding the File: prefix:

Wikimedia Commons-related tags.tag: {{Now Commons}}: file has been copied to Commons

subgroup.name: nowcommonsName
subgroup.tooltip: Name of the image on Commons (if different from local name), excluding the File: prefix:

Cleanup tags.tag: {{Bad font}}: SVG uses fonts not available on the thumbnail server
{{Bad format}}: PDF/DOC/... file should be converted to a more useful format
{{Bad GIF}}: GIF that should be PNG, JPEG, or SVG
{{Bad JPEG}}: JPEG that should be PNG or SVG
{{Imagewatermark}}: image contains visible or invisible watermarking
{{NoCoins}}: image using coins to indicate scale
{{Overcompressed JPEG}}: JPEG with high levels of artifacts
{{Remove border}}: unneeded border, white space, etc.
{{Rename media}}: file should be renamed according to the criteria at [[WP:FMV]]

subgroup.name: renamemediaNewname
subgroup.tooltip: Enter the new name for the image (optional)

subgroup.name: renamemediaReason
subgroup.tooltip: Enter the reason for the rename (optional)

Cleanup tags.tag: {{Should be PNG}}: GIF or JPEG should be lossless
{{Should be SVG}}: PNG, GIF or JPEG should be vector graphics

list.tag: {{Should be SVG|alphabet}}: character images, font examples, etc.
{{Should be SVG|circuit}}: electronic circuit diagrams, etc.
{{Should be SVG|coat of arms}}: coats of arms
{{Should be SVG|diagram}}: diagrams that do not fit any other subcategory
{{Should be SVG|emblem}}: emblems, free/libre logos, insignias, etc.
{{Should be SVG|fair use}}: fair-use images, fair-use logos
{{Should be SVG|graph}}: visual plots of data
{{Should be SVG|music}}: musical scales, notes, etc.
{{Should be SVG|physical}}: 'realistic' images of physical objects, people, etc.
{{Should be SVG|symbol}}: miscellaneous symbols, icons, etc.

Cleanup tags.tag: {{Should be text}}: image should be represented as text, tables, or math markup

Image quality tags.tag: {{Image hoax}}: Image may be manipulated or constitute a hoax

subgroup.name: ImagePoorQualityReason
subgroup.tooltip: Enter the reason why this image is so bad (required)

subgroup.name: lowQualityChemReason
subgroup.tooltip: Enter the reason why the diagram is disputed (required)
